mapper.select: SELECT * FROM boots_admin LEFT JOIN boots_admin_role on boots_admin.aid = boots_admin_role.aid LEFT JOIN boots_role on boots_admin_role.rid = boots_role.rid LEFT JOIN boots_role_permission on boots_role.rid = boots_role_permission.rid LEFT JOIN boots_permission on boots_role_permission.pid = boots_permission.pid WHERE boots_admin.aid = #{aid}

SELECT DISTINCT boots_permission.* FROM boots_admin LEFT JOIN boots_admin_role ON boots_admin.aid = boots_admin_role.aid LEFT JOIN boots_role on boots_admin_role.rid = boots_role.rid LEFT JOIN boots_role_permission on boots_role.rid = boots_role_permission.rid LEFT JOIN boots_permission on boots_role_permission.pid = boots_permission.pid WHERE boots_admin.username = #{username}
